Yaiba-0.2.2: Implementation of Buchberger's algorithmsSource codeContentsIndex
Yaiba.Ideal
Description
Ideals are represented as lists of tuples consisting of a Poly and a Sugar.
Documentation
newtype Ideal ord Source
